member.name: T:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController
member.summary: Accounts API

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.Activate(System.String)
member.summary: Activates an account using the specified activation token.
member.remarks: The necessary activation token must be obtained from e.g. an email or a mobile text message.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.Add(DHI.Services.WebApi.DTOs.AccountDTO)
member.summary: Adds a new account.
member.remarks: Adding a new account automatically activates the account.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.Update(DHI.Services.WebApi.DTOs.AccountUpdateDTO)
member.summary: Updates an existing account.
member.remarks: The password can be omitted from an update, but all other properties must be present. Otherwise, they will be set to null.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the account with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an account with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.GetAll
member.summary: Gets a list of all accounts.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of accounts.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.Register(DHI.Services.WebApi.DTOs.RegistrationDTO)
member.summary: Performs an account registration.
member.remarks: An account registration must be followed by an account activation before the account is activated and valid. A one-time activation token is generated and an activation link with the generated reset token is sent to the user account in an email.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.UpdateMe(DHI.Services.WebApi.DTOs.MeDTO)
member.summary: Modifies the account of the calling user.
member.remarks: A user can modify his own Password as well as the Email, PhoneNumber and Company properties. If any of these properties are ommitted in the body, they will be set to null. Other account properties cannot be modified.
member.response: Forbidden. This endpoint is only to update calling users own account

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.ResetPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a one-time token that allows for a password reset.
member.remarks: Generates a one-time token that allows for a password reset for the account identified by the given email address or account ID. A password reset link with the generated reset token is sent to the user account in an email.
member.param: The email address or account ID.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.AccountsController.UpdatePassword(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the password for the user account associated with the given token.
member.remarks: The necessary password reset token must be obtained from e.g. an email or a mobile text message.

member.name: T:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController
member.summary: Job Hosts API

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the job host with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.GetList(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of job hosts.
member.remarks: If no group is given, a list of all job hosts is retrieved. If a group is given, a list of job hosts within the given group is retrieved. This is only applicable if the connection type is grouped.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of job hosts.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.GetFullNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of job host full-name identifiers.
member.remarks: NOTE: Only applicable if the connection type is grouped (hierarchical). If a group is given, a list of time series full-name identifiers within the given group (recursive) is retrieved.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.GetIds
member.summary: Gets a list of all job host IDs.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.Add(DHI.Services.WebApi.DTOs.HostDTO)
member.summary: Adds a new job host.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.Update(DHI.Services.WebApi.DTOs.HostDTO)
member.summary: Updates an existing job host.

member.name: M:DHI.Services.WebApi.Controllers.JobHostsController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the job host with the specified identifier.

member.summary: Gets the last log entry fullfilling the given query.
